Description: On I-81 at mile marker 296 in the County of Shenandoah, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle fire. The north right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Fire

Description: On Rt. 688 North in the County of Mecklenburg, in the vicinity of Wilkerson Rd; Rt. 677E/W (Mecklenburg County), motorists can expect delays due to standing water.
Label: Minor Incident - Standing Water - Advisory

Description: On I-64 at mile marker 291.9 in the City of Chesapeake, near 464 Interchange, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The east exit 291B narrows.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 148.5 in the County of Prince William, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled tractor trailer. The south right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Tractor Trailer
